message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,300,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint and need to make sure it fits within it.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but my price reflects the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,200,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I still think $1,200,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,050,000. I really like the product and I'm willing to pay a premium, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
